author: Jill Dupleix
method: Dissolve the coffee in 125ml/4fl oz boiling water, then strain. Add the sugar, brandy and 500ml/17fl oz water and bring to the boil, stirring. Add the prunes, bring to the boil and cook at quite a fast simmer for 30-45 minutes until the liquid is thick and syrupy. Serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp ground espresso coffee,  300g/10Â½oz sugar,  2 tbsp brandy,  450g/1lb large prunes, dried and pitted
